response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its exceptional value and quality, it's worth noting that the product holds a significant importance to me, valued at $1,200,000. Considering its immense worth to you, I am extending this offer to you at a special price of $950,000. This is an excellent chance to secure a remarkable asset at a competitive rate. I look forward to your positive response. Kind regards, Alice.", "product_price": 950000}
